result.markdown: --- title: "Schema" editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html} DCAT Schema v1.1 ISO8601 Guidance ``` ::: ::: # `dataset` Fields ## `bureauCode` Federal agencies, combined agency and bureau code from [OMB Circular A-11, Appendix C](https://obamawhitehouse.archives.gov/sites/default/files/omb/assets/a11_current_year/app_c.pdf). Use the format of `015:11`. ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 368 × 6 agency_name bureau_name agency_code bureau_code treasury_code cgac_code 1 Legislative Bran… Senate 001 05 00 000 2 Legislative Bran… House of R… 001 10 00 000 3 Legislative Bran… Joint Items 001 11 00 000 4 Legislative Bran… Capitol Po… 001 13 02 002 5 Legislative Bran… Office of … 001 12 09 009 6 Legislative Bran… Congressio… 001 14 08 008 7 Legislative Bran… Architect … 001 15 01 001 8 Legislative Bran… Botanic Ga… 001 18 09 009 9 Legislative Bran… Library of… 001 25 03 003 10 Legislative Bran… Government… 001 30 04 004 # ℹ 358 more rows ``` ::: ::: ## `programCode` Federal agencies, list the primary program related to this data asset, from the [Federal Program Inventory](https://resources.data.gov/schemas/dcat-us/v1.1/FederalProgramInventory_FY13_MachineReadable_091613.csv). Use the format of `015:001`. ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 1,554 × 6 agency_name program_name additional_informati…¹ agency_code program_code 1 Department of A… Rural Busin… 005 005-001 2 Department of A… Rural Busin… 005 005-002 3 Department of A… Energy Assi… 005 005-003 4 Department of A… Distance Le… 005 005-004 5 Department of A… Rural Elect… 005 005-005 6 Department of A… Rural Water… 005 005-006 7 Department of A… Single Fami… 005 005-007 8 Department of A… Multi-Famil… 005 005-008 9 Department of A… Farm labor … 005 005-009 10 Department of A… Rental Assi… 005 005-010 # ℹ 1,544 more rows # ℹ abbreviated name: ¹​additional_information_optional # ℹ 1 more variable: program_code_pod_format ``` ::: ::: ## `accrualPeriodicity` ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` term iso_8601 1 Decennial R/P10Y 2 Quadrennial R/P4Y 3 Annual R/P1Y 4 Bimonthly R/P2M or R/P0.5M 5 Semiweekly R/P3.5D 6 Daily R/P1D 7 Biweekly R/P2W or R/P0.5W 8 Semiannual R/P6M 9 Biennial R/P2Y 10 Triennial R/P3Y 11 Three times a week R/P0.33W 12 Three times a month R/P0.33M 13 Continuously updated R/PT1S 14 Monthly R/P1M 15 Quarterly R/P3M 16 Semimonthly R/P0.5M 17 Three times a year R/P4M 18 Weekly R/P1W 19 Hourly R/PT1H ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} iso_8601 <- \(x) { kit::nswitch( x, "R/P10Y", "Decennial", "R/P4Y", "Quadrennial", "R/P1Y", "Annual", "R/P0.5M", "Bimonthly", "R/P2M", "Bimonthly", "R/P0.5W", "Biweekly", "R/P2W", "Biweekly", "R/P3.5D", "Semiweekly", "R/P1D", "Daily", "R/P6M", "Semiannual", "R/P2Y", "Biennial", "R/P3Y", "Triennial", "R/P0.33W", "Three Times a Week", "R/P0.33M", "Three Times a Month", "R/PT1S", "Continuously Updated", "R/P1M", "Monthly", "R/P3M", "Quarterly", "R/P0.5M", "Semimonthly", "R/P4M", "Three Times a Year", "R/P1W", "Weekly", "R/PT1H", "Hourly") } accrual_key |> dplyr::mutate( iso_test = iso_8601(iso_8601) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` term iso_8601 iso_test 1 Decennial R/P10Y Decennial 2 Quadrennial R/P4Y Quadrennial 3 Annual R/P1Y Annual 4 Bimonthly R/P2M or R/P0.5M 5 Semiweekly R/P3.5D Semiweekly 6 Daily R/P1D Daily 7 Biweekly R/P2W or R/P0.5W 8 Semiannual R/P6M Semiannual 9 Biennial R/P2Y Biennial 10 Triennial R/P3Y Triennial 11 Three times a week R/P0.33W Three Times a Week 12 Three times a month R/P0.33M Three Times a Month 13 Continuously updated R/PT1S Continuously Updated 14 Monthly R/P1M Monthly 15 Quarterly R/P3M Quarterly 16 Semimonthly R/P0.5M Semimonthly 17 Three times a year R/P4M Three Times a Year 18 Weekly R/P1W Weekly 19 Hourly R/PT1H Hourly ``` ::: :::
